review_data: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2020
name: Sarah Richie
title: Food Starch Abomination
review: This is some of the worst yoghurt Iâ€™ve tasted in my life. I blame the tapioca starch - other brands of nonfat yogurt without the starch taste a lot better and are better for you. This tastes like yogurt pudding instead of the real thing. Steer clear of this stuff.

review_data: Reviewed in the United States on June 19, 2016
name: Martin J Kovar
title: Five Stars

review_data: Reviewed in the United States on August 24, 2015
name: Bryan
title: eat up soothingly
review: I just realized something- I haven't actually seen Dannon's yogurt in grocery stores in a very long time.I also remember a girl I used to know named Dannon who was extremely cute and I haven't seen her in 20 years.I can't remember her last name so I can't exactly look her up online and find her.Then again Dannon isn't really a popular girls name anyway is it?Maybe I can find her.Anyway this isn't about girls, this is about yogurt!I used to eat this stuff all the time as a kid.It was quite the popular yogurt brand in the 80's and 90's.However for 10 years now, my local grocery store stopped carrying it.Why I have no idea.Unless they have it tucked away in a spot that's hard to find.That wouldn't surprise me... normally, however this grocery store is *very* organized and the reason I love shopping there.Oh well, if you can find this yogurt (either plain or with the fruit on the bottom) it's actually really delicious and I highly recommend it.
